english.segment1: Turn the page. Can't turn the light out. Every word, every line. Carries to my soul. Dark letters on a page. Singing so loud. Where did I go wrong. Not to hear You?
english.segment2: Eighteen years, I guess it was all right. I let You do the thinking, I'd just bide my time. Father to son. Sunday hand-me-down. Where did I go wrong. Not to hear Your song?
english.segment3: It's a beautiful sound. Moving through the crowd. Voices lifted up. On high for You.
english.segment4: It's a beautiful song. We've only just begun to understand. Rediscovering You.
english.segment5: To have found You, and still be looking for You, It's "the soul's paradox of love.". You fill my cup, I lift it up for more. I won't stop now that I'm free. I'll be chasing You. Like You chase me.
english.segment6: It's a beautiful sound. Moving through the crowd. Voices lifted up. On high for You.
english.segment7: It's a beautiful song. We've only just begun to understand. Rediscovering You.
english.segment9: It's a beautiful sound. Moving through the crowd. Voices lifted up. On high for You.
english.segment10: It's a beautiful song. We've only just begun to understand. Rediscovering You.
english.segment11: It's a beautiful sound. Moving through the crowd. Voices lifted up. On high for You.
english.segment12: It's a beautiful song. We've only just begun to understand. Rediscovering You.
english.segment13: It's a beautiful sound. Moving through the crowd. Voices lifted up. On high for You.
english.segment14: It's a beautiful song. We've only just begun to understand. Rediscovering You.
english.segment15: Something tells me it's all right. You know it's gonna be all right.
